primCategory.name: NADDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundametal dimensions of solids and offset for NAD (Not A Detector) components, like the grid.
primCategory.prim: Full thickness of grid between towers (not half-width) Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004.
Thickness of grid on outside towers. Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004. Correct for bulk of web; lower bound for bottom. Bottom of grid has variable thickness of up to 42.24 mm.
Height of grid web. Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004.
Cut-outs for calorimeters. Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004.
Height of grid flange. Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004.
Cutouts in the flange. Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004.
Thickness of inner parts of grid flange. Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004.
Flange overhangs web. Verified against LAT-DS-01579 on 5 May 2004.
Transverse dimension of X-LAT plate, from LAT-TD-00564-12
Z dimension of X-LAT plate, from LAT-TD-00564-12
Mass of X-LAT plate, from LAT-TD-00564-12
Blanket thickness as of May, 2006. See https://confluence.slac.stanford.edu/display/ACD/Thermal+Blanket
Blanket thickness as of May, 2006. See https://confluence.slac.stanford.edu/display/ACD/Thermal+Blanket
Distance from top of side tile to bottom of crown of blanket (room temperature). May, 2006.
Distance from top tile to bottom of blanket. May, 2006
Transverse distance across crown. May, 2006
Z-distance from top of crown to top of lower, central part of blanket. May, 2006
Max transverse distance across top blanket, from outside of crown. From as-build document ACD-RPT-000394 RevA
Z-dimension of blanket sides, from https://confluence.slac.stanford.edu/display/ACD/Thermal+Blanket, May, 2006
z-offset in LAT coordinate system of GASU, PDU, SIU, EPU, HIB
x-offset for siu's and epu #2. Other epu's and pdu use negative of this value
TEMs are in a 4x4 array. This is the smaller of two transverse displacement values
TEMs are in a 4x4 array. This is the larger of two transverse displacement values
All TEMs have the same z-displacement
EPUs have y-offset equal to this value or its opposite.
Average as-built mass of the 16 TEMs installed in the LAT in grams.
As-built GASU mass in grams.
As-built PDU mass in grams.
As-built mass of the 2 SIUs and 3 EPUs installed in the LAT in grams.
As-build mass of the 5 HIBs installed in the LAT in grams
x-offset of GASU (electronics)
y-offset of GASU (electronics)
x-offset of PDU (electronics)
y-offset of PDU (electronics)
TEMs have equal x- and y-dimension
z-dimension of TEM.
x-dimension of GASU (electronics)
y-dimension of GASU (electronics)
z-dimension of GASU (electronics)
x-dimension of PDU (electronics)
y-dimension of PDU (electronics)
z-dimension of PDU (electronics)
SIU, EPU and HIB all have the same transverse dimensions
SIU, EPU and HIB all have the same z dimension
Typical thickness for aluminum box around electronics is .1 inch
Standard aluminum density
Transverse dimension of an envelope containing LAT electronics
X-dimension of each LAT radiator from LAT-TD-00564-12
Y-dimension of each LAT radiator from LAT-TD-00564-12
Z-dimension of each LAT radiator from LAT-TD-00564-12
Average mass in grams of the radiators (true measured values from LAT-TD-00564-12: 40300 for +Y, 41100 for -Y)
CMx for both radiators from LAT-TD-00564-12
CMz for both radiators from LAT-TD-00564-12
CMy for +Y radiator from LAT-TD-00564-12

primCategory.name: SCPrim
primCategory.overview: Dimensions for 'spacecraft' components such as primary structure, electronics, batteries, etc.
primCategory.prim: Width of primary structure. Cross-section is an (irregular) octagon: a square with corners clipped off, so no side is as large as SCWidth, which is the length of a side of the enclosing square.
Length of X- and Y-sides of primary structure
Approximate Z-dimension of spacecraft primary structure
Chosen so that, with material=Al, total mass is about 250 kg </font> for thickness of primary structure
Outer radius of hydrazine tank, from spec sheet
Minimum wall, from spec sheet
Mass in grams of hydrazine propellant
Mass in grams of half the batteries
Z-displacement relative to LAT origin of top of radiators (measuring from 1/4 scale pictures)
Z-distance from top of skirt to top of radiators
Arbitrary. Will calculate density of skirt's material to give correct total mass
Mass of spacecraft skirt in grams
As measured from 1/4 scale drawings
Length of connecting rods for solar panels
Radius of connecting rods for solar panels
Solar panel length (extending out from spacecraft)
Solar panel width
Solar panel thickness
Solar panel thickness
Optical bench is on -X side. Y and Z dimensions were measured from 1/4-scale drawings
Optical bench is on -X side. Y and Z dimensions were measured from 1/4-scale drawings
Mass in grams (source: S.Ritz)
Just what it says.
